0.text:
Innate: Viktor can augment each of his basic abilities at the cost of 100 Hex Fragments, which he gains from killing enemies:
 Minions and  monsters generate 1 Hex Fragment.
Siege minions, super minions, and epic monsters generate 5 Hex Fragments.
Enemy  champion  takedowns generate 25 Hex Fragments.
0.html:
Innate: Viktor can augment each of his basic abilities at the cost of 100 Hex Fragments, which he gains from killing enemies:

  • Minions and monsters generate 1 Hex Fragment.
  • Siege minions, super minions, and epic monsters generate 5 Hex Fragments.
  • Enemy champion takedowns generate 25 Hex Fragments.
markedPassages: Minions
monsters
champion
takedowns

1.text: Chaos Storm becomes augmented once all of Viktor's basic abilities have been augmented.
1.html: Chaos Storm becomes augmented once all of Viktor's basic abilities have been augmented.
markedPassages: Chaos Storm

0.text: Active: Viktor throws a device at the target enemy that deals magic damage. He also grants himself a  shield for 27 − 105 (based on level) (+ 18% AP) for 2.5 seconds and gains Discharge for 3.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Viktor throws a device at the target enemy that deals magic damage. He also grants himself a shield for 27 − 105 (based on level) (+ 18% AP) for 2.5 seconds and gains Discharge for 3.5 seconds.
markedPassages: shield

1.text: Discharge: Viktor's next basic attack is empowered to become  non-projectile and deal modified magic damage.
1.html: Discharge: Viktor's next basic attack is empowered to become non-projectile and deal modified magic damage.
markedPassages: non-projectile

2.text: Augment: Turbocharge: After the device hits, Viktor gains  30% bonus movement speed for 2.5 seconds and the shield's strength is increased by 60%, up to 48 − 184 (based on level) (+ 32% AP).
2.html: Augment: Turbocharge: After the device hits, Viktor gains  30% bonus movement speed for 2.5 seconds and the shield's strength is increased by 60%, up to 48 − 184 (based on level) (+ 32% AP).
markedPassages: Augment: Turbocharge
30% bonus movement speed

0.text: Active: Viktor deploys a gravity field at the target location for 4 seconds. After a 0.75-second delay, it activates to  slow enemies within, persisting for 0.25 seconds after leaving the area or generating 3 stacks.
0.html: Active: Viktor deploys a gravity field at the target location for 4 seconds. After a 0.75-second delay, it activates to slow enemies within, persisting for 0.25 seconds after leaving the area or generating 3 stacks.
markedPassages: slow

1.text: The field applies a stack to enemies within every 0.5 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. The third stack consumes them all to  knock down and  stun the target for 1.5 seconds. The target then becomes immune to Gravity Field's effects, occurring once per cast.
1.html: The field applies a stack to enemies within every 0.5 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. The third stack consumes them all to knock down and stun the target for 1.5 seconds. The target then becomes immune to Gravity Field's effects, occurring once per cast.
markedPassages: knock down
stun

2.text: Augment: Magnetize: Viktor's other abilities, excluding  Chaos Storm's persistent damage,  slow enemies hit by 20% for 1 second.
2.html: Augment: Magnetize: Viktor's other abilities, excluding Chaos Storm's persistent damage, slow enemies hit by 20% for 1 second.
markedPassages: Augment: Magnetize
Chaos Storm's
slow

0.text: Active: Viktor fires an energy beam along the target path that deals magic damage to enemies hit and briefly grants  sight of the area.
0.html: Active: Viktor fires an energy beam along the target path that deals magic damage to enemies hit and briefly grants sight of the area.
markedPassages: sight

1.text: Augment: Aftershock: The path explodes along the beam's wake after 1 second, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.
1.html: Augment: Aftershock: The path explodes along the beam's wake after 1 second, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.
markedPassages: Augment: Aftershock

0.text: Active: Viktor conjures an arcane singularity at the target location, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area and  disrupting their  channeled abilities.
0.html: Active: Viktor conjures an arcane singularity at the target location, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area and disrupting their channeled abilities.
markedPassages: disrupting
channeled abilities

1.text: The singularity then remains active for 6.5 seconds, dealing magic damage to enemies within it every second and granting  sight of the area. The singularity targets the nearest champion hit by its initial damage and will follow them, moving faster based on its proximity to Viktor.
1.html: The singularity then remains active for 6.5 seconds, dealing magic damage to enemies within it every second and granting sight of the area. The singularity targets the nearest champion hit by its initial damage and will follow them, moving faster based on its proximity to Viktor.
markedPassages: sight

2.text: Chaos Storm can be recast at any time while the singularity is active.
2.html: Chaos Storm can be recast at any time while the singularity is active.

3.text: Recast: Viktor directs the singularity to the target location or enemy champion.
3.html: Recast: Viktor directs the singularity to the target location or enemy champion.

4.text: Augment: Perfect Storm: The singularity moves 25% faster.
4.html: Augment: Perfect Storm: The singularity moves 25% faster.
markedPassages: Augment: Perfect Storm

5.text: Chaos Storm's recast can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.
5.html: Chaos Storm's recast can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control.
markedPassages: cast-inhibiting crowd control
possibleConcerningAbilities: Chaos Storm's recast can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average champion level) seconds (210 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average champion level) seconds (210 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+15 ability power
+70 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
Unique – Drain: Restore 1 mana every second, increased to 1.5 for 10 seconds when you damage an enemy champion. If you cannot gain mana, heal for「 45% of this value 」「 0.675 」instead.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FOCUS: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.

Keywords

Consume

Regenerates 4 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 120 health.
consume.originText: Regenerates 4 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 120 health.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+80 ability power
+20 ability haste
+600 mana
+6 magic penetration

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Echo: Dealing ability damage to an enemy deals 100 (+ 10% AP) additional magic damage to them and launches orbs at up to 3 other enemies within 600 units around them, impacting after 0.528 seconds to deal the same damage to each, and grants you 15% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Dealing ability damage against champions reduces the cooldown of Echo by 0.5 seconds per champion, up to a maximum of 3 seconds per cast (10 second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 magic penetration.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ECHO: Dealing ability damage to an enemy deals 100 (+ 10% AP) additional magic damage to them and launches orbs at up to 3 other enemies within  600 units around them, impacting after 0.528 seconds to deal the same damage to each, and grants you 15% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Dealing ability damage against champions reduces the cooldown of Echo by 0.5 seconds per champion, up to a maximum of 3 seconds per cast (10 second cooldown).

Passive

Unique – Cinderbloom: Dealing magic damage to champions ignores 10 − 20 (based on target's current health) of their magic resistance, increased to maximum value if the they were affected by a shield within the last 5 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CINDERBLOOM: Dealing magic damage to champions ignores 10 − 20 (based on target's current health) of their magic resistance, increased to maximum value if the they were affected by a  shield within the last 5 seconds.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Stasis: Put yourself in stasis for 2.5 seconds, rendering you untargetable and invulnerable for the duration but also unable to move, declare basic attacks, cast abilities, use summoner spells, or activate items (120 second cooldown).
